ncl:0362c62796482ac4.title: Video: Interpreting Holter Monitor Reports Workshop
ncl:0362c62796482ac4.description: NCL Training Hub ran a workshop for GPs and GP trainees to enable them to become more confident in interpreting the most common findings shown on Holter monitor reports. Watch the full recording here.

ncl:ebb7876dc7dad0aa.title: News: HSL Review pathology test results look-up system goes live
ncl:ebb7876dc7dad0aa.description: The HSL Review system aims to provide GPs with a single location where pathology results from north central London's main provider trusts can be found, as well as radiology results from Royal Free London.

ncl:091be5663364f64f.title: Event: NHS Diabetes Prevention Programme: Update on the Patient SMS Self-Registration Template
ncl:091be5663364f64f.description: Join Camden Health and Wellbeing at 12.30pm on Tuesday 10 March for an introduction to the new NHS Diabetes Prevention Programme (NDPP) patient SMS self-registration template, now embedded in AccuRx.

ncl:ca1918b29794aee8.title: News: Measles update: Infection prevention and control measures in primary care
ncl:ca1918b29794aee8.description: The UK Health Security Agency has reported an active measles outbreak across north central London. There have been some exposure incidents in general practice, highlighting the need for strengthened infection prevention and control. Read more

ncl:82b8262b5823a1af.title: News: NHS England Health Insight Survey (Wave 18): Key findings
ncl:82b8262b5823a1af.description: NCL ICB has shared the latest insights from the NHS England Health Insight Survey (Wave 18). These reflect significant efforts made by practices to enhance the patient journey when contacting and using GP services.

ncl:664a47dd5d2c04ed.title: News: EMIS Global update: 9-13 February 2026
ncl:664a47dd5d2c04ed.description: See what's new in EMIS Global.

ncl:f2ee4e5069a8282b.title: Page: Childhood immunisations (0-5)
ncl:f2ee4e5069a8282b.description: Practices are encouraged to review the Measles, Mumps, Rubella and Varicella (MMRV) Vaccination Programme GP Toolkit for up‑to‑date guidance and resources to support delivery of the MMRV vaccine.

ncl:06e2cd5ca39687bc.title: News: Wood Green CDC: Safeguarding guidance for appointments
ncl:06e2cd5ca39687bc.description: Wood Green Community Diagnostic Centre (CDC) is asking for your support to inform patients referred to the centre not to bring children to appointments, as childcare cannot be provided.

ncl:196ab1204408153b.title: Page: Practice Vacancies
ncl:196ab1204408153b.description: NCL practice vacancies that have been sent in to the NCL General Practice Website and remain open for applications are listed on this page.

ncl:3be8cbd44c573f7f.title: Event: CNWL Update in Sexual Health, Blood Born Viruses and Contraception
ncl:3be8cbd44c573f7f.description: An update for clinicians on sexual health, including blood-borne viruses and contraception, provided by CNWL at 8.45am on Tuesday 10 March.

nhs:556a6b8586933b20.title: Women attending first NHS mammogram hits 10-year high as thousands more cancers found
nhs:556a6b8586933b20.description: Hundreds of thousands more women attended NHS breast screening last year and thousands more cancers were diagnosed early in England. New figures today show that in 2024/25, 1.94 million women aged 50 to 70 attended screening within six months of invitation – up nearly 200,000 (193,745) from 1.75 million the previous year. As a result, […]

nhs:45e2227fbc5c5969.title: NHS facing ‘second surge’ in vomiting virus as cases reach highest level this winter
nhs:45e2227fbc5c5969.description: The NHS could be facing a “second surge” in norovirus as the vomiting bug reaches its highest level so far this winter. Figures published today show the average number of patients in hospital with norovirus each day this week rose to over 1,000 for the first time this winter (1,012). The total is a jump […]

nhs:7e7798edd70f3c38.title: “NHS talking therapies completely changed my life”: NHS launches major campaign to support millions more people with anxiety
nhs:7e7798edd70f3c38.description: Millions of adults facing debilitating anxiety conditions are missing out on treatment that could help them recover and get back on with their lives the NHS has said, as it launches a major new mental health campaign. New analysis of NHS data shows that over 670,000 people were treated with NHS talking therapy care last […]

nhs:5dc3d83374593b03.title: Thousands recruited for “new era” severe mental illness study
nhs:5dc3d83374593b03.description: Thousands of people living with schizophrenia and severe depression are being recruited by the NHS for a major new study which could unlock a “new era” of personalised treatment for severe mental illness. As part of the world’s largest mental health study, researchers will analyse the DNA of thousands of people alongside detailed questionnaires to […]

nhs:86e142aa1bc715f3.title: NHS waiting list lowest in almost 3 years as NHS battled busiest winter on record
nhs:86e142aa1bc715f3.description: The NHS delivered more elective activity in 2025 than any other year in its history, helping cut the waiting list to its lowest level since February 2023. Staff delivered a historic high of 18.4 million treatments and operations in 2025, up from 18 million in 2024, as the waiting list dropped to 7.29 million. Today’s […]

nhs:e5334b333ef4439d.title: Early NHS preparation ‘paying off’ amid shorter ambulance handover times
nhs:e5334b333ef4439d.description: Ambulances handed over patients more than 2 minutes faster last month despite facing their busiest January since before COVID-19. Provisional figures out today show there were 420,324 ambulances handovers with known times in January, the highest number for the month since 2020 and a 5.2% increase compared to 399,415 in January last year. Despite this, […]

nhs:725e5add6fa05488.title: NHS services tackling winter head on
nhs:725e5add6fa05488.description: Ambulances unloaded patients three minutes faster last week, even as A&Es saw more ambulance handovers than any point last winter. Figures released today show there were 94,551 ambulance handovers last week – higher than the busiest week last year (94,493 w/e 29 December 2024), and up almost 1,000 on the week previous and over 3,250 […]

nhs:79d8bd472aa1d556.title: NHS launches trailblazing AI and robot pilot to spot lung cancer sooner alongside screening programme set to tackle cancer inequalities
nhs:79d8bd472aa1d556.description: Patients facing suspected lung cancer could get answers sooner under a new NHS pilot using artificial intelligence and robotic technology to help doctors reach hard-to-detect cancers earlier, with fewer invasive tests.  The new approach uses AI software to rapidly analyse lung scans and flag small lumps that are most likely to be cancerous, and a robotic camera is then used to […]

nhs:79c973cc1b7b9d5a.title: NHS to detect and prevent thousands more bowel cancers with more sensitive screening
nhs:79c973cc1b7b9d5a.description: Thousands of cases of bowel cancer will be diagnosed earlier or even prevented in England, as part of major NHS plans to increase the sensitivity of bowel cancer screening to save more lives. NHS England today announced it is to lower the threshold for a home-screening kit to trigger urgent cancer testing from next month, […]

nhs:fd30178434d3d55c.title: Thousands at risk of inherited cancers to receive regular NHS checks through world-first genetics programme
nhs:fd30178434d3d55c.description: Thousands of people at higher risk of developing cancer due to inherited faulty genes will be regularly checked and tracked by the NHS thanks to a first-of-its-kind national genetics programme. The world-first genetic register, developed by the NHS, will collect patient information on over 100 genes linked to an increased risk of cancer, with plans […]

artp:a3ef6fa2c3ab6bdc.title: Opportunity For Artpregistered Professionals In Spirometry Reporting

artp:e28e46110208fe0e.title: New Artp Standard Respiratory And Sleep Physiology Diagnostic Reporting

artp:2bceb14dc98b4f6e.title: Phd Studentship Sponsored By Mmu Uhcw

nhs:be4d6c98a5904999.title: People searching NHS advice on high blood pressure skyrocketed last year
nhs:be4d6c98a5904999.description: The number of people searching for trusted NHS advice on high blood pressure surged in 2025 with hundreds of thousands of extra visits to online information on risk and how to get checked. The NHS webpage on high blood pressure rocketed from 30th place in 2024, to the second most visited health condition on NHS.uk […]

nhs:dbc8496b50e5bedf.title: Tens of thousands with vitiligo to be offered “life-changing” new cream on NHS to restore skin colour
nhs:dbc8496b50e5bedf.description: Tens of thousands of people living with vitiligo affecting their face are to be offered the first approved medicine on the NHS to restore lost skin colour. The new cream, known as ruxolitinib, will be offered to nearly 100,000 people aged 12 and over who have a form of the condition where white patches typically […]

ncl:3855cdd02c8226d1.title: News: EMIS Global update: 16-20 February 2026
ncl:3855cdd02c8226d1.description: See what's new in EMIS Global

ncl:2f73361c1daacdf2.title: News: Medicines Supply Notification: Phenobarbital 30mg and 60mg tablets
ncl:2f73361c1daacdf2.description: Phenobarbital tablets are in short supply, with resupply expected at the end of March 2026. Prescribers are advised not to start new patients on these medications.

ncl:d3e2f6a6e5613c13.title: News: Medicines Supply Notification: Sodium Valproate (Epilim Chronosphere®) 100mg modified release granules sachets sugar free
ncl:d3e2f6a6e5613c13.description: Sodium valproate 100mg sachets are out of stock until mid-April 2026; reserve supplies for patients with epilepsy concerns.

ncl:30d3a2f1982b5fc9.title: News: SPA referral route available for adult mental health teams
ncl:30d3a2f1982b5fc9.description: GPs should use an EMIS single referral form to make non-urgent direct referrals into adult community mental health services within Camden, Enfield and Islington.

ncl:f367e219aca303c1.title: News: Lab introduces more accurate cholesterol measurements
ncl:f367e219aca303c1.description: Changed methodology at Health Services Laboratories (HSL) has enabled more accurate reporting of LDL-cholesterol (LDL-C) in patients with serum triglycerides up to 9.0 mmol/L.

ncl:622cad0abc361d4c.title: News: Update to recall of several Nestle® SMA® specialist and standard infant formula
ncl:622cad0abc361d4c.description: The UK Health Security Agency has issued updated briefing notes on the infant and follow-on formula recall due to possible cereulide toxin contamination. These should be read in conjunction with the previous notes.

ncl:4829140b1ac94f94.title: News: Update: Which container to use for faecal calprotectin tests
ncl:4829140b1ac94f94.description: See which container to use when. Samples collected in the incorrect container will be rejected and not processed, causing delays.

ncl:bcf05de5f417f2c4.title: News: Single point of access introduced for adult community mental health teams
ncl:bcf05de5f417f2c4.description: Use the new EMIS single point of access referral form for non-urgent direct referrals into adult community mental health services.

ncl:13c6f12d4057ab28.title: News: Finchley Memorial CDC update: Temporary pause on cardiology referrals (24-hour tape & echocardiograms)
ncl:13c6f12d4057ab28.description: The tests will be reintroduced for GP direct access via choose and book from 1 April 2026, once the current patient backlog has been cleared.

ncl:7d44f8d5ae790eb7.title: Service: Adult Hospital at Home: NMUH
ncl:7d44f8d5ae790eb7.description: Service update: NMUH's Adult Hospital at Home accepts direct GP referrals, providing acute care for adults in their usual residence, preventing unnecessary hospital admissions.

ncl:ec7751a7d79e0bd0.title: Page: Urgent suspected cancer: Indicative wait for first appointment data
ncl:ec7751a7d79e0bd0.description: Continued capacity constraints across north central London are leading to longer waits for patients following urgent suspected cancer first appointments (previously known as 2WW). See the latest data.

nhs:3385b994b054a7ba.title: Patients handed over quicker despite 5-year high in number taken to hospital
nhs:3385b994b054a7ba.description: Ambulance crews and A&E staff have slashed handover delays by more than 7 minutes this winter – even as they ferried the highest number of patients to hospital in half a decade. Figures out today show that more than 1.2million patients were handed over (1,234,731) to A&Es by ambulances so far this winter. This is […]
